video.title: Restaurant: Impossible Collection
video.synopsis: Armed with $10,000 and lots of tough love, chef Robert Irvine gives down-and-out restaurants drastic makeovers, fixing everything from food to decor.

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine has seen a lot of dirty and neglected restaurants in his day, but none has made him physically ill like Anna Maria's.
episodes.title: Anna Maria's

episodes.synopsis: It's clear to Chef Irvine why Woody's Tupelo Steakhouse is drowning in debt: The dining room is a dusty cave, and the service is worse than the food.
episodes.title: Woody's Tupelo Steakhouse

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine sets out to overhaul an uninspired, cluttered interior and the severe lack of leadership at the center of the Pelican Grill's problems.
episodes.title: Pelican Grill

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine's latest mission takes him to California's Pappas Restaurant, a family-owned Greek eatery on the brink of extinction.
episodes.title: Pappas Restaurant

episodes.synopsis: After eking out a living selling takeout barbecue, Tarrance Pollard opened an eat-in establishment. But his investment is in danger of failure.
episodes.title: Pollard's Bar-B-Que

episodes.synopsis: The First Lady asks Chef Irvine to renovate the kitchen and create a dining room and community garden to provide a healthy, vegetable-fueled meal.
episodes.title: White House Edition

episodes.synopsis: Lynn and Ken bought the Main Dish restaurant five years ago, but they find themselves in debt and working 80 hours a week.
episodes.title: The Main Dish

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine's latest mission takes him to the Philadelphia suburb of Milmont Park and a restaurant called the Italian Village.
episodes.title: Italian Village

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine heads to a small-town Mexican restaurant that's been around for six years but has since gone south.
episodes.title: Gusanoz Mexican Restaurant

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine travels to Michigan, where he's on a mission to rescue a single mom and her restaurant, Paliani's, from its impending demise.
episodes.title: Paliani's Restaurant

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine heads to Las Vegas to help 26-year-old Ashley save the struggling Maple Tree Cafe.
episodes.title: Maple Tree Cafe

episodes.synopsis: At the once-profitable Valley Inn, a family death, combined with a difficult economy, has left the restaurant struggling to bring in customers.
episodes.title: Valley Inn

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine is heading to Kansas City to save a once-flourishing family restaurant and repair the relationship between two sisters.
episodes.title: Poco's on the Boulevard

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine heads to Minnesota to help a struggling husband and wife team who need help saving their restaurant -- and maybe even their marriage.
episodes.title: Bronk's Bar and Grill

episodes.synopsis: The owners of the Whiskey Creek Steakhouse have lost nearly everything, and Chef Irvine suspects someone might be stealing from them.
episodes.title: Whiskey Creek Steakhouse

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine heads to Arizona to help the owners of Sapori D'Italia, a restaurant where the customers have been replaced by sounds of family fighting.
episodes.title: Sapori D'Italia

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine and his team must clean up the Dinner Bell Restaurant, freshen the menu, and fix the staff's bad habits before the owner loses everything.
episodes.title: Dinner Bell Restaurant

episodes.synopsis: Maniaci's Italian Bistro was a thriving family business run by Mrs. Maniaci until her death. Now, her three sons are running it into the ground.
episodes.title: Maniaci's Italian Bistro

episodes.synopsis: The owners of Sweet Tea's Restaurant and Catering opened up a storefront, but the nondescript building isn't attracting customers.
episodes.title: Sweet Tea's Restaurant and Catering

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine helps George and Theresa save their family-run Old World Italian Restaurant by handing over control to their son, George Jr.
episodes.title: Father Knows Worst

episodes.synopsis: Six years after her husband's death, a struggling restaurant owner refuses to make any changes, despite the ill-prepared food and mounting debt.
episodes.title: Drowning in Debt

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine travels to Smyrna, Delaware, to meet three generations who are fighting to keep the Wagon Wheel Family Restaurant open.
episodes.title: Muskrat Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine's off to Pier West Restaurant, a struggling family-owned eatery that's falling deeper and deeper into debt.
episodes.title: Sink or Swim

episodes.synopsis: Chef Irvine travels to Michigan to repair the Kalico Kitchen, where the food is subpar and the kitchen is filthy.
episodes.title: Kalico Kraziness

episodes.synopsis: The owners of the Benner Street Restaurant should be close to retirement, but they're so deep in debt that they may never be able to stop working.
episodes.title: Good Food, Bad Vices
